net.myorb.gral

Class ExtendedBarRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.AbstractPointRenderer
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.DefaultPointRenderer2D
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.BarPlot.BarRenderer
          • net.myorb.gral.ExtendedBarRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.PointRenderer, java.io.Serializable

    public class ExtendedBarRenderer
extends de.erichseifert.gral.plots.BarPlot.BarRenderer
    copied from GRAL BarPlot class. Properties interface replaces references to Plot. Bars can be displayed with style set be properties. refactor of original GRAL source done by Michael Druckman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      added to replace Plot class as source of style properties

        connect bar renderer to series

        data - the series containing one bar of data
        properties - the properties to use for style
